items.name: Spaghetti
items.description:
Large cozy kettle for four bowls. Ideal for fragrant herbal teas and strong hugs.
Volume about 800 ml

items.name: Sweet Condensed Milk
items.description:
Big Turk "Child of the Earth" talks about the Guardian's song, a wooden pipe, and how the Lesa grasses listened attentively to her.
Volume of 250 ml
Clay, glaze (enamel), milking, wood

items.name: Safety Matches
items.description:
Box with the Guardian Forest. Suitable for storing snowy sugar cranberries, rings and secrets.
Inside, the last green leaf hides from the cold.
Dimensions: 9x9x5 cm
